arabic_text: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى
translation: Moses said, “Your appointment is the festival day[14]; let the people be gathered at forenoon[15].”
footnotes:
[14] So that more people could witness the event.
 [15] So that people could see Allah’s signs clearly.
